title: Maine Food Finder
description: A project done with OpenMaine, a Code for America brigade, to provide information about when and where food pickups are available during COVID-19 epidemic.

title: App Challenge Resources
description: Created as a resource for students competing in a mobile application contest. This project is no longer maintained.

title: US Baby Names API
description: An API created to help explore trends in US baby names over time. Neither the API or UI are complete yet, but development is still active.

title: Math Team Trainer
description: Prototype online platform for math contest preparation. Users can track their progress, comment on problems, and compete for top spots on the leaderboard

title: Filler Content Generator
description: Randomized filler content generator. Options include Lorem Ipsum text, color palettes, and data

title: Fractal Explorer
description: Mathematical pattens created with the js canvas. A custom html templating system is used to build the source

title: Boston Jazz Gigs
description: Created for a jazz musician group as a marketing and event inquiry platform. Includes a GUI content editing tool, support for music sample uploads and playback, and contact forms

title: URL Shortener
description: A tool for creating URL aliases in a base-62 encoding

title: Boggle Solver
description: A simple word finder for randomly generated legal Boggle boards.
